title: Software Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Turing is a leading technology company dedicated to advancing the frontiers of artificial intelligence and software development. Renowned for its innovative approach, Turing collaborates with top\\-tier research institutions and industry partners to develop cutting\\-edge AI solutions that transform industries and empower developers worldwide. The company fosters a dynamic and inclusive environment that encourages continuous learning, innovation, and excellence. With a global presence and a commitment to remote work, Turing attracts top talent from around the world, providing them with opportunities to work on impactful projects that shape the future of technology.
   

  

**About The Role**
 The role at Turing involves working closely with a leading AI research lab to enhance next\\-generation AI coding platforms through expert Go development. As a Go developer, you will be responsible for reviewing and refining AI\\-generated Go code, addressing complex runtime and scalability challenges, and integrating AI capabilities into real\\-world production systems. This position offers a fully remote, flexible work environment, allowing you to manage your schedule and work from any location. Your expertise will directly influence how AI systems learn to generate reliable, scalable, and production\\-ready Go code, making this a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of AI and software engineering innovation.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Candidates should possess a minimum of three years of professional software engineering experience with a strong focus on Go programming. A deep understanding of the Go standard library, concurrency patterns, and systems design is essential. Proven experience in improving code quality, managing large code repositories, and contributing to open\\-source projects is highly valued. Familiarity with GitHub workflows and version control best practices is required. Excellent problem\\-solving skills, strong communication abilities in English, and the capacity to work independently in a remote setting are critical. Bonus points are given to applicants with exposure to AI, machine learning, or code\\-generation technologies, as well as contributions to open\\-source projects.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Review and validate AI\\-generated Go code to ensure optimal performance, efficiency, and reliability.
* Identify and resolve complex concurrency, runtime, and scalability issues within Go applications.
* Enhance evaluation workflows through rigorous testing, benchmarking, and adherence to code quality standards.
* Collaborate effectively with AI researchers, engineers, and other stakeholders to set project priorities and deliver impactful results.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of AI\\-assisted coding tools and frameworks.
* Document findings, best practices, and technical insights to facilitate knowledge sharing across teams.


**Benefits**
 Turing offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your professional growth and personal well\\-being. As a remote employee, you enjoy the flexibility to work from anywhere, enabling a healthy work\\-life balance. The role provides opportunities for career advancement, allowing you to build expertise at the intersection of Go programming and artificial intelligence. You will have access to ongoing learning resources, collaborative projects, and the chance to contribute to impactful AI research. Additionally, Turing fosters a culture of innovation and inclusivity, where your contributions are valued and recognized.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Turing is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. We believe that a diverse team enhances our ability to innovate and deliver exceptional solutions. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply and become part of our vibrant community dedicated to technological advancement and social equity.

title: Java Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Applicantz is a leading global technology company renowned for its innovative solutions and commitment to excellence. As a part of a Fortune 500 conglomerate, Applicantz has established itself as a pioneer in delivering cutting\\-edge technology services across various industries. The company fosters a progressive culture that values creativity, diversity, and continuous learning. With a focus on leveraging the latest technological advancements, Applicantz aims to stay ahead of the curve and provide transformative solutions to its clients worldwide. The organization emphasizes integrity, honesty, and passion for excellence, making it an ideal workplace for professionals seeking growth and impactful work in the tech domain.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled and dedicated Software Engineer with expertise in Java and Spring Boot to join our dynamic team on a 6\\-month contract basis. This role is based in Pune with a hybrid work model, offering a flexible environment that combines remote and onsite work. The successful candidate will be responsible for maintaining, optimizing, and enhancing existing REST API services, designing reusable components, and collaborating within an Agile environment to deliver high\\-quality software solutions. This position provides an exciting opportunity to work with state\\-of\\-the\\-art technologies and contribute to innovative projects that impact global markets. The ideal candidate should possess a strong background in microservices architecture, cloud platforms, and software development best practices, ensuring the delivery of robust, scalable, and maintainable solutions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 4\\+ years of experience in Java and Spring Boot development, with at least 3\\+ years dedicated to REST API development, including monitoring and analytics. Proficiency with Docker, microservices architecture, and cloud platforms such as AWS (ECS, Aurora, ElastiCache) is essential. A solid understanding of server\\-side frameworks, multi\\-threading, and concurrency is required. Candidates must be proficient with version control systems like Git and have a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science or an equivalent field. Additional knowledge of cloud security, security development lifecycle, and experience with AI tools such as GitHub Copilot or Cursor is preferred. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Spinnaker, as well as monitoring tools like Splunk and Dynatrace, will be advantageous. The candidate should demonstrate a passion for developing testable, maintainable, and robust software solutions.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The key responsibilities for this role include maintaining, optimizing, and enhancing existing REST API services to ensure high performance and reliability. You will be involved in designing and implementing reusable, modular components that seamlessly integrate into existing applications and services. Breaking down complex problems into manageable components and providing clear, effective solutions is essential. Handling customer support requests, fixing bugs, and prioritizing tasks to build efficient solutions will be part of your daily activities. You should have a passion for writing clean, testable, and maintainable code, leveraging analytics to monitor performance and system availability. Working collaboratively within an Agile environment, you will contribute to team goals, participate in sprint planning, and ensure timely delivery of features. Additionally, you will stay updated on emerging technologies and best practices to continuously improve the quality of deliverables and the efficiency of development processes.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Applicantz offers a competitive and comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of its employees. During this contract, you will have access to flexible working arrangements, fostering a healthy work\\-life balance. The company invests in continuous learning and development opportunities, including technical training and certifications. You will be part of a vibrant, innovative environment that encourages creativity and collaboration. Additionally, employees benefit from exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies, a supportive team culture, and opportunities to work on impactful projects with global reach. The organization values diversity and inclusion, ensuring a respectful and enriching workplace for all employees.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Applicantz is committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees are treated with respect and dignity. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected status under applicable law. We believe that diversity drives innovation and excellence, and we are dedicated to fostering a workplace that reflects our values of equity and inclusion.

title: Embedded Systems Internship in Hyderabad
description:
Are you a talented and eager Embedded Systems enthusiast looking for an exciting internship opportunity? Look no further than Controlytics AI Private Limited! As an Embedded Systems intern with us, you will have the chance to work with cutting\\-edge technologies such as ARM Microcontrollers, Raspberry Pi, STM32, and Internet of Things (IoT) platforms.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and implement embedded software solutions using C Programming language.
* Design and test firmware for ARM Microcontrollers for various applications.
* Utilize Raspberry Pi and Arduino platforms to create innovative IoT projects.
* Collaborate with the team to troubleshoot and optimize embedded systems performance.
* Create and maintain documentation for all embedded software and hardware designs.
* Assist in the integration and testing of C\\+\\+ programming for embedded control systems.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date on industry trends and advancements in embedded systems technology.


 If you are passionate about pushing the boundaries of embedded systems technology and are proficient in C Programming, ARM Microcontrollers, and IoT platforms, then we want to hear from you! Apply now and join our dynamic team at Controlytics AI Private Limited.
   

  

 About Company: We are passionate engineers and researchers who believe in digital transformation and help organizations in their digital journey. Our focus is industrial automation. We build different products for enabling digitization in factories using cutting\\-edge technologies.
company_industry: Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing and Higher Education

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
These positions are Back End Engineer positions.
   

  

**Tech Stack Is**
* Java, Springboot, Microservices,
* AWS or Cloud Native Deployment:Event bridge Api gateway DynamoDb CloudWatch
* Spring boot: Annotations, Autowiring with reflection, spring starters, auto\\-configuration vs configuration
* CI CD Tools, Gradle or Maven Knowledge, Docker, containers, scale up and scale down
* Health checks, Distributed Tracing, exception handling in micorservices
* Lambda expressions, threads, streams


**Responsibilities**
 The ideal candidates for these positions will have 7 years experience in these technologies.
   

  

 The candidates need to be comfortable working with complex code and complex requirements
   

  

 The applications will be built at a scale to support anywhere from 100000 to millions of current low CPU / low bandwidth connections
   

  

**Requirements**
* Java, Springboot, Microservices,
* AWS or Cloud Native Deployment:Event bridge Api gateway DynamoDb CloudWatch


**Nice to have**
 Knowledge of GraphQL is a "Plus"
   

  

 Prior experience working on projects with a lot of PII data or workin in Financial Services industry is a "Plus"
   

  

**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: PHP Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Founded in 1995, Cybage Software Pvt. Ltd is a technology consulting organization specializing in outsourced product engineering services. As a leader in the Technology and product engineering space, Cybage works with some of the world's best independent software vendors. Our solutions are focused on modern technologies and are enabled by a scientific, data driven system called Decision Mines for Digital Excellence. This unique model de\\-risks our approach, provides better predictability, and ensures a better value per unit cost for our clients.
   

  

 You will get an opportunity to be a part of a highly skilled talent pool of more than 7500 employees. Apart from Pune, we have our operations hub in GNR and Hyderabad as well and we have marked our presence in North America, Canada, UK, Europe, Japan, Australia, and Singapore. We provide seamless services and dependable deliveries to our clients from diverse industry verticals such as Media and Entertainment, Travel and Hospitality, Online Retail, Healthcare, SCM and Technology.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Cybage Software is looking for a highly experienced PHP\\-Laravel Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in PHP development, particularly with the Laravel framework, and will play a pivotal role in leading and mentoring a team of developers. This role offers an excellent opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge projects, contribute to high\\-quality software solutions, and influence the technical direction of the team. The candidate must be hands\\-on, detail\\-oriented, and capable of balancing leadership responsibilities with active coding to ensure timely and efficient project delivery.
   

  

 The role involves collaborating closely with cross\\-functional teams including QA, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure the delivery of scalable, maintainable, and high\\-performance applications. The candidate will also be responsible for implementing best practices in coding, version control, testing, and deployment processes, fostering a culture of continuous learning and technical excellence within the team.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 6\\+ years of professional experience in PHP development, with a proven track record working with Laravel. Strong expertise in object\\-oriented programming (OOP), REST APIs, and common design patterns is essential. Candidates should have hands\\-on experience with Git for version control and CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and deployment. Proficiency with Docker is required, along with a good understanding of frontend frameworks such as Vue.js, React, or Angular. Excellent debugging and problem\\-solving skills, coupled with strong communication and leadership abilities, are critical for success in this role.
   

  

 Academic qualifications should include a relevant degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Certifications in Laravel, Docker, or related technologies will be considered an added advantage.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Lead and mentor a team of PHP/Laravel developers, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Remain actively involved in coding activities, ensuring the development of high\\-quality, scalable, and maintainable codebases.
* Conduct regular code reviews, enforce coding standards, and promote best practices across the team.
* Collaborate with QA, project managers, and product teams to facilitate smooth project delivery and meet client expectations.
* Assist in troubleshooting and resolving technical challenges, ensuring minimal downtime and optimal application performance.
* Implement and oversee version control, testing, and deployment processes, ensuring adherence to industry standards.
* Monitor application performance metrics and recommend improvements for scalability and efficiency.
* Share knowledge and updates on Laravel, related tools, and emerging technologies to encourage continuous learning within the team.


**Benefits**
 Cybage Software offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of our employees. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and wellness programs. Employees have access to ongoing training and development opportunities, including certifications and workshops, to stay updated with the latest industry trends. We promote a flexible work environment with options for remote work, along with a supportive team culture that values innovation, collaboration, and work\\-life balance. Additionally, employees are encouraged to participate in various corporate social responsibility initiatives and team\\-building activities.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Cybage Software is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. We believe that diversity and inclusion drive innovation and excellence, and we are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities to all qualified candidates.

title: Performance Engineering
description:
**Job Description**
 Value added Service \\[Acceptance Solutions]is a Product Development (PD) Group within the Technology Team. This group is responsible for building leading edge full\\-service Payment Solutions for our customers by combining global payment processing, fraud management, payment security and reporting systems. We are a group of bright, motivated engineers and technical managers excited about building the next generation of Payment products that will drive e\\-Commerce, mobile\\-Commerce as well as POS businesses for our customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accountable for creating application and infrastructure performance plans/models for a highly scalable, low\\-latency, highly\\-available and high\\-throughput payment processing system.
* Work with the architects and development team to ensure proper metrics instrumentation done in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Hands on experience in Unix/Linux OS environments and operating system internals, file systems, disk/storage and networking protocols System internals. Having working knowledge with VMs and Containers.
* Expert knowledge and strong experience using tools, Loadrunner/Jmeter,. etc. and understanding of APM solutions like Appdynamics, dynatrace, OPNET,. etc
* Coding Knowledge in programming languages like Java/Python and scripting languages is must
* Evaluate, develop and execute load test tools to stress the limits of most critical payment applications.
* Understand and performance test the APIs, abstractions and integration patterns to solve challenging distributed computing problems.
* Should have experience in defining Performance Strategy and reporting performance baselines required to certify Go\\-Lives. Should have strong experience in handling multiple tasks and stakeholders
* Should be well versed in documenting the steps performed during course of performance tests cycle including performance test scripts used
* Should be able to able to look at the code and suggest optimization techniques.
* Should have ability to work independently and be a team player.
* Actively contribute to capacity planning and disaster recovery exercises.
* Support in triaging and troubleshooting of issues related to performance degradation incidents in production environment
* Monitor application performance, optimize performance bottlenecks and usage to create an application capacity model.
* Help optimizing system components such as CPU/Memory/Disk/Network \\& OS/Application software for maximizing the computer resources utilization.


**Requirements**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Mainframe Performance and Capacity Managment
description:
10\\+ years of strong experience in Mainframe performance specially Application performance tuning and optimization
   

  

* Strong knowledge and expertise with programming and performance tuning of Online and Batch applications comprising DB2, CICS, PL/1, COBOL, MQ, JCL, SYNCSORT, Utilities, Datasets and Storage
* Excellent working experience with performance management tools and products (like DB2 Explain, RMFMON 3, Strobe, APA, CICS Performance Analyzer and the Omegamon products)
* Strong knowledge of SMF record types and sub\\-types
* Ability to drive proactive performance management
* Have experience in reporting, presentations, Excel and other reporting tools
* Prior experience as Mainframe System programmer and or capacity planning is also a plus Analyse Mainframe Applications performance for both batch and online and recommend Application tuning opportunities
* Provide recommendations to Application Development organizations for applications tuning
* Help and guide Development organizations to implement tuning recommendations
* Follow\\-up proactively with development organizations to track progress on tuning recommendations
* Continuous exploration for optimization opportunities in Mainframe Systems and Online/Batch applications by gained experience and knowledge
* Create \\& present performance reports/metrics with recommendations for best\\-in\\-class efficiency solutions
* Report status to Management / stakeholders on overall tuning initiatives Preferred Loc: BLR, Pune

description:

* Develop and modify custom features and functionalities as required in the existing WordPress site

 About Company: Scholarthi is a platform with a mission to connect students with different scholarship opportunities globally. Scholarthi works as a scholarship aggregator, which helps students search for the right scholarships for them \\& apply where they get the most benefit.
